text: The canton of Istres is an administrative division of the Bouches-du-Rhône department, in southeastern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Istres.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône It consists of the following communes: #Fos-sur-Mer #Istres #Saint-Mitre-les-Remparts ==References== Category:Cantons of Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Canton of Istres
